product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Granola with Freeze-Dried Bananas and Milk - 32 Servings
long_description: Get your day started with a helping of Backpacker's Pantry Granola with Freeze-Dried Bananas and Milk. Easy to prepare-just add cold or hot water, stir thoroughly and serve. Can contains 32 servings; scoop out what you need and take it along on your backpacking trip. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Get your day started with a helping of Backpacker's Pantry Granola with Freeze-Dried Bananas and Milk.
